CML specific routines in core

Interface Summary
AbstractCMLFilter  
CMLEditor edits one of CMLMolecule, Spect, React, etc.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTransformConverter Superclass of TransformConverter provides templates for transformation
CML2CMLLiteConverter  
CML2CMLLiteConverterTest  
CMLCommon  
CMLConverters manages converters for commandline lookup
CMLEditorList a converter which contains a specific editor the editor is invoked to act on the CML
CMLLiteHelper  
CMLSelector selects one or more nodes from a cmlElement convenience methods uses Xpath
CMLSplitter splits file into multiple parts using xpath.
MoleculeTransformElement extension of TransformElement functionality, separated for convenience this may evolve to a subclass of TransformElement later
RawXML2CMLProcessor abstract class for RawXML2CML conversion.
ZMatrixElement
